Texts.Chs: 这张地图指引我通往古老的翠绿遗址，听说其内有着大量的叶族文物。
Texts.Eng: The map shows me how to get to some ancient, overgrown ruins. It supposedly holds a wealth of floran artifacts.

Texts.Chs: 好吧，看起来这废墟并不是被叶族遗弃，我是否把这里的秘密都找到了呢？
Texts.Eng: Well, looks like the ruins weren't as abandoned as I thought they would be. Did I manage to discover all of its secrets?
